code: import Container from'react-bootstrap/Container';import Row from'react-bootstrap/Row';import Col from'react-bootstrap/Col';import ListGroup from'react-bootstrap/ListGroup';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const pricingData=[{id:1,plan:'Basic',price:'£49',features:['Wireframing','Visual Design','5 pages','Free Hosting','Support & Assistance'],link:'https://www.google.com'},{id:2,plan:'Premium',price:'£149',features:['Wireframing','Visual Design','15 pages','Free Hosting','Support & Assistance'],link:'https://www.facebook.com'},{id:3,plan:'Ultimate',price:'£349',features:['Wireframing','Visual Design','Unlimited pages','Free Hosting','Support & Assistance'],link:'https://www.twitter.com'}];function AppPricing(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{id:"pricing",className:"block pricing-block",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Container,{fluid:true,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"title-holder",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Pricing & plans"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"subtitle",children:"check our pricing & plans"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Row,{children:pricingData.map(pricing=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Col,{sm:4,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"heading",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:pricing.plan}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"price",children:pricing.price})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"content",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ListGroup,{children:pricing.features.map((feature,index)=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ListGroup.Item,{children:feature},index);})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"btn-holder",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:pricing.link,className:"btn btn-primary",children:"Order Now"})})]},pricing.id);})})]})});}export default AppPricing;
